text: Continuum is the 3rd studio album by rock musician John Mayer. The album was released in September 2006. The album holds singles by John Mayer like "Waiting on the World to Change", "Gravity", and "Belief". == Album == The album features mainly new songs, though "Gravity" and "Vultures" are available in live versions from John Mayer Trio's Try!, and "Bold as Love", which is a Jimi Hendrix cover: the first Hendrix cover that Mayer has ever recorded as a studio release (although Mayer has recorded other Hendrix songs over time in live settings such as "The Wind Cries Mary" and "Wait Until Tomorrow"). (Mayer had played "Bold as Love" live many times prior to the release of Continuum such as on the televised Tsunami Aid: A Concert of Hope which aired on January 15, 2005.) The album contains a collaboration between Mayer and 8-string guitarist Charlie Hunter on the song "In Repair". == Singles == * "Dreaming With a Broken Heart" (2007) * "Waiting on the World to Change" (2007) * "Gravity" (2007) * "Belief" (2006) * "Say" (only on the re-release) (2008) == Track listing == # "Waiting on the World to Change" - 3:20 # "I Don't Trust Myself (With Loving You)" - 4:52 # "Belief" - 4:02 # "Gravity" - 4:05 # "The Heart of Life" - 3:18 # "Vultures" - 4:10 # "Stop This Train" - 4:45 # "Slow Dancing in a Burning Room" - 4:02 # "Bold as Love" - 4:18 # "Dreaming With a Broken Heart" - 4:05 # "In Repair" - 6:00 # "I'm Gonna Find Another You" - 2:43 == Discography == Album * 2002 - Room for Squares * 2003 - Heavier Things * 2006 - Continuum === Charts and certifications === Chart (2006) Providers Peak position Certification Sales Billboard 200 Albums Chart (U.S.) Billboard 2 2x Platinum 2,225,616 Billboard Comprehensive Albums (U.S.) Billboard 2Billboard.com Top Comprehensive Albums 2006-09-21 Billboard Digital Albums (U.S.) Billboard 1Billboard.com Top Digital Albums 2006-09-21 326,000 Billboard Internet Albums (U.S.) Billboard 3Billboard.com Top Internet Albums 2006-09-21 326,000 Billboard Top Rock Albums (U.S.) Billboard 1Billboard.com Top R&B;/Hip-HopAlbums 2006-09-21 Australian Albums Chart ARIA 12 Gold 35,000+ Canadian Albums Chart Nielsen SoundScan 2 Platinum 100,000+ UK Albums Chart BBC 47 20,000+ New Zealand Albums Chart RIANZ 9 Gold 7,500+ Denmark Top 40 Albums Chart IFPI Danmark & ACNielsen 24 Netherlands Top 100 Albums Chart GfK Mega Charts 12 United World Chart (Worldwide sales) Media traffic 2Global Track Chart 2x Platinum 3,000,000+ == References == Category:2006 albums
